Detailed Description

Removes noise (high frequencies) and the gross signal (low frequencies).

Author:
valliappa.lakshmanan

LatLonGrid edu.ou.asgbook.transforms.FFTBandpassFilter.convolve ( LatLonGrid  data  )  

00035                                                {
00036         Complex[][] in1 = zeropad(data);
00037         final int nrows = in1.length;
00038         final int ncols = in1[0].length;
00039 
00040         // compute the fft
00041         in1 = fft(in1);
00042         
00043         // the fft is arranged in quadrants, so we need to be careful
00044         // to remove the corresponding data in all the quadrants
00045         Complex zero = new Complex(0,0);
00046         double diag = Math.sqrt(nrows*nrows+ncols*ncols)/4;
00047         for (int i=0; i < nrows/2; ++i){
00048             for (int j=0; j < ncols/2; ++j){
00049                 double r = Math.sqrt(i*i + j*j)/diag;
00050                 if (r < minr || r > maxr){
00051                     in1[i][j] = zero; // 1st quadrant
00052                     in1[nrows-i-1][j] = zero; // 3rd quadrant
00053                     in1[i][ncols-j-1] = zero; // 2nd quandrant
00054                     in1[nrows-i-1][ncols-i-1] = zero; // 4th quadrant
00055                 }
00056             }
00057         }
00058         
00059         // take ifft
00060         Complex[][] result = ifft(in1);
00061         
00062         // return real part, rounded off
00063         LatLonGrid out = LatLonGrid.copyOf(data);
00064         for (int i=0; i < out.getNumLat(); ++i) for (int j=0; j < out.getNumLon(); ++j){
00065             out.setValue(i,j, (int)Math.round(result[i][j].real));
00066         }
00067         return out;
00068     }
